Nerangs.ab: āat̰.dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm ka xšnūman ī nōg nābar bēd miϑrahe vouru.gaōiiaōitōiš ... frauuaṣ̌inąm ayāb ān xšnūman ī kē bēd

"At āat̰.dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm, when it is the šnūman for nōgnāwar, (they should continue with) miϑrahe vouru.gaōiiaōitōiš ... frauuaṣ̌inąm or the corresponding šnūman.
